name: Out in space (itch)
description:
MADE BY: BojoEnderGame, Apsie17

Description:
Out in Space is an 8-bit shooter/platformer which takes shooting out of your hands! Switch randomly between 3 unique weapons and fight many aliens!

Controls:
The games decides randomly on which direction you are shooting, the only controls ar W,A,S,D to move and R to restart the level due to some bugs we had during development and couldn’t be fixed.
